title: PM grieved at loss of lives in road accident on Karakorum Highway
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 7 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Tuesday expressed his deep shock and grief over the tragic road accident near Chilas on Karakorum Highway, which caused loss of precious human lives.
He prayed for the departed souls and expressed his condolences with the bereaved families.
The Prime Minister also prayed for the early recovery of injured and directed the authorities concerned to provide all possible medical aid to the injured.
